column4: no XP is running just fine... but the Ubuntu installer no longer has the INSTALL option its just the "Demo and Full Installation" and the "Learn More" options when at first i had 3 options and the third was "Install"
are you trying to remove your old ubuntu install, and clean install over it, or what?
have you considered just installing like a normal person, and partitioning your internal drive and setting up a dual boot?
and what options did you say it gave you?
